questionTitle: Some birds, such as quails, can move <u><font color='red'>instant</font></u> from a <u><font color='red'>resting</font></u> position <u><font color='red'>to</font></u> full <u><font color='red'>flight</font></u>.
He <u><font color='red'>launched</font></u> <u><font color='red'>out</font></u> <u><font color='red'>in</font></u> <u><font color='red'>extravagance</font></u>.

When I was a child I always wanted to ________ to play the piano.
I can't make ________ what's happening.

He took the trouble to write ________ the complete list for us.
________ the papers, the Prime Minister is giving a speech on the economy tomorrow.

Biting one's fingernails is a very bad ________.
Are you saying you want me to work all weekend? You ________ be serious.

Don't blame me ________ that!
